intro: From Skewers to Success – Build, Cook, and Rule the Kebab Scene!
description:
Welcome to Kebab Simulator 2025, where sizzling skewers, mouthwatering flavors, and restaurant mastery await! Start from a humble food stall and grow your dream kebab restaurant into the hottest spot in town. Design your eatery, craft the perfect menu, and serve up delicious dishes to satisfy hungry customers.

Expand your recipe book with flavors from around the world—grill succulent meats, prepare tasty appetizers, and whip up delectable desserts. Customize your space with unique decorations, stylish furniture, and a signboard that makes your shop impossible to miss.

Will your kebab joint become a legendary dining destination? Time to sharpen your knives and find out!
